title: Songs I
text:
the
    sky
        was
can  dy  lu
minous
       edible
spry
     pinks shy
lemons
greens   coo  l choc
olate
s.

   un   der,
   a  lo
co
mo
   tive     s   pout
                    ing
                       vi
                       o
                       lets
seo_description: A poem by E. E. Cummings in “XLI Poems”
